page.title: 05Shopping,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: Windsor Drive has a purpose-built parade of shops.Crescent Way provides a variety of shops,a Post Office and a restaurant.There is ample parking near-by.There are 8 shops at the junction of Goddington Lane and the A224. Most people do their main shopping in Orpington.There is a large garage on the corner of Goddington Lane,offering full services and car-hire.At the bottom of Norsted Lane there are 6 shops and a Post Office. For weekly shopping most people go to Orpington or Bromley.Green Street Green has a variety of shops,a Post Office,an estate agent and a building Society. There is a large supermarket.There 23 shops in Farnborough village,including a number of specialist shops and a Post Office.
